INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With the calcium salts administered by oral route: decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the calcium salts (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the tetracycline antibiotic (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the iron salts (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the fluoroquinolones (more than two hours apart, if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the zinc salts (more than two hours apart, if possible).
